Verses: 1 pollaadhavargalaik Kuriththu Erichchaladaiyaadhe; Niyaayakkeduseygiravargalmel Poraamaikollaadhe.
2 avargal Pullaippol Seekkiramaai Aruppundu, Pasumpoondaippol Vaadippovaargal.
3 karththarai Nambi Nanmai Sey; Dhesaththil Kudiyirundhu Saththiyaththai Meyndhukol.
4 karththaridaththil Manamakizhchchiyaayiru; Avar Un Irudhayaththin Vendudhalgalai Unakku Arulseyvaar.
5 un Vazhiyaik Karththarukku Oppuviththu, Avarmel Nambikkaiyaayiru; Avare Kaariyaththai Vaaikkappannuvaar.
6 un Needhiyai Velichchaththaippolavum, Un Niyaayaththaip Pattappagalaippolavum Vilangappannuvaar.
7 karththarai Nokki Amarndhu, Avarukkuk Kaaththiru; Kaariyasiththiyullavanmelum Theevinaikalaich Seygira Manushanmelum Erichchalaagaadhe.
8 kobaththai Negizhndhu, Ukkiraththai Vittuvitu; Pollaappuchseyya Edhuvaana Erichchal Unakku Vendaam.
9 pollaadhavargal Aruppundupovaargal; Karththarukkuk Kaaththirukkiravargalo Boomiyaich Sudhandhariththukkolvaargal.
10 innung Konjanerandhaan, Appodhu Dhunmaarkkan Iraan; Avan Sthaanaththai Utru Visaariththaayaanaal Avan Illai.
11 saandhagunamullavargal Boomiyaich Sudhandhariththu, Migundha Samaadhaanaththinaal Manamagizhchchiyaayiruppaargal.
12 dhunmaarkkan Needhimaanukku Virodhamaaith Theengu Ninaiththu, Avanperil Parkadikkiraan.
13 aandavar Avanaippaarththu Nagaikkiraar; Avanudaiya Naal Varugiradhendru Kaangiraar.
14 sirumaiyum Elimaiyumaanavanai Madivikkavum, Semmai Maarkkaththaarai Vizhappannavum, Thunmaarkkar Pattayaththai Uruvi, Thangal Villai Naanetrugiraargal.
15 aanaalum Avargal Pattayam Avargaludaiya Irudhayaththirkul Uruvippom; Avargal Villugal Muriyum.
16 anega Thunmaarkkarukkulla Selvaththiratchiyaippaarkkilum, Needhimaanukkulla Konjame Nalladhu.
17 dhunmaarkkarudaiya Puyangal Muriyum; Needhimaangalaiyo Karththar Thaangugiraar.
18 uththamargalin Naatkalaik Karththar Arindhirukkiraar; Avargal Sudhandharam Endrendraikkum Irukkum.
19 avargal Aabaththukkaalaththile Vetkappattuppogaadhirundhu, Panjakaalaththile Thirupthiyadaivaargal.
20 dhunmaarkkaro Azhindhupovaargal, Karththarudaiya Saththurukkal Aattukkuttigalin Ninaththaippol Pugaindhupovaargal, Avargal Pugaiyaaip Pugaindhupovaargal.
21 dhunmaarkkan Kadanvaangich Seluththaamarpogiraan; Needhimaano Irangikkodukkiraan.
22 avaraal Aaseervadhikkappattavargal Boomiyaich Sudhandhariththukkolluvaargal; Avaraal Sabikkappattavargalo Aruppundupovaargal.
23 nalla Manushanudaiya Nadaigal Karththaraal Urudhippadum, Avanudaiya Vazhiyinmel Avar Piriyamaayirukkiraar.
24 avan Vizhundhaalum Thallundupovadhillai; Karththar Thamadhu Kaiyinaal Avanaith Thaangugiraar.
25 naan Ilaignanaayirundhen, Mudhirvayadhullavanumaanen; Aanaalum Needhimaan Kaividappattadhaiyum, Avan Sandhadhi Appaththukku Irandhuthirigiradhaiyum Naan Kaanavillai.
26 avan Niththam Irangik Kadankodukkiraan, Avan Sandhadhi Aaseervadhikkappadum.
27 theemaiyai Vittu Vilagi, Nanmai Sey; Endrendraikkum Nilaiththiruppaai.
28 karththar Niyaayaththai Virumbugiravar; Avar Thamadhu Parisuththavaangalaik Kaividuvadhillai; Avargal Endraikkum Kaakkappaduvaargal; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Sandhadhiyo Aruppundupom.
29 needhimaangal Boomiyaich Sudhandhariththukkondu, Endraikkum Adhile Vaasamaayiruppaargal.
30 needhimaanudaiya Vaai Gnaanaththai Uraiththu, Avanudaiya Naavu Niyaayaththaip Pesum.
31 avanudaiya Dhevan Aruliya Vedham Avan Irudhayaththil Irukkiradhu; Avan Nadaigalil Ondrum Pisaguvadhillai.
32 dhunmaarkkan Needhimaanmel Kanvaiththu, Avanaik Kolla Vagaithedugiraan.
33 karththaro Avanai Ivan Kaiyil Viduvadhillai; Avan Niyaayam Visaarikkappadugaiyil, Avanai Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerppadhumillai.
34 nee Karththarukkuk Kaaththirundhu, Avarudaiya Vazhiyaik Kaikkol; Appozhudhu Nee Boomiyaich Sudhandhariththukkolvadharku Avar Unnai Uyarththuvaar; Dhunmaarkkar Aruppundupovadhai Nee Kaanbaai.
35 kodiya Balavandhanaana Oru Dhunmaarkkanaik Kanden; Avan Thanakketra Nilaththil Mulaiththirukkira Pachchaimaraththaippol Thazhaiththavanaayirundhaan.
36 aanaalum Avan Ozhindhuponaan; Paarungal, Avan Illai; Avanaith Thedinen, Avan Kaanappadavillai.
37 nee Uththamanai Nokki, Semmaiyaanavanaip Paarththiru; Andha Manushanudaiya Mudivu Samaadhaanam.
38 akkiramakkaarar Egamaai Azhikkappaduvaargal; Aruppundupovadhe Dhunmaarkkarin Mudivu.
39 needhimaangaludaiya Ratchippu Karththaraal Varum; Ikkattukkaalaththil Avare Avargal Adaikkalam.
40 karththar Avargalukku Udhaviseydhu, Avargalai Viduvippaar; Avargal Avarai Nambiyirukkirabadiyaal, Avargalaith Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Kaikkuth Thappuviththu Ratchippaar.
